thread.title: This 2-Legged Dog Getting a Set of Wheels Will Make You Cry Happy Tears
thread.title_full: This 2-Legged Dog Getting a Set of Wheels Will Make You Cry Happy Tears

author: Hedy Phillips
title: This 2-Legged Dog Getting a Set of Wheels Will Make You Cry Happy Tears
text:
This 2-Legged Dog Getting a Set of Wheels Will Make You Cry Happy Tears January 24,   190 Shares 
This little lady is lucky. After being born missing her front legs and being abandoned in the middle of San Francisco, Daffodil was brought to the SF SPCA for help. The vets on staff saw her potential for great things, so they decided to get her outfitted with her own set of wheels. They contacted OrthoPets to custom fit her for prosthetics, and before they knew it, Daffodil's new ride was ready. Watch the video to see her try out her wheels for the first time. It's guaranteed to make you say "aww."
